name: Ruth Fleishman
biography: Ruth Fleishman has lectured in the Art and Multimedia Departments of Victoria University, Deakin Unversity and Homesglen Tafe. She exhibited her work 多spacejunk多 in Experimenta's 多Waste多 program and at Electrofringe, NSW in 2001. As well as attending year Siggraph with !Oink, she was accepted to participate in Time_Place_Space, Hybrid Art Workshop at Charles Sturt University, Wagga Wagga. This was facilitated by Performance Space, Sydney. Ruth's work 'Vietnam-A Psychic Guide' received grants from The Australia Council, Myer Foundation and Arts Victoria and was shown at the North Melbourne Town Hall in August 2003.
